description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Your system has been invaded by unknown attackers, the fleet is disabled. Can you repel the intruders alone in your single fighter? Twin stick action melded with old school shooter. Multiple planets and levels of of gameplay.
description.short: Your system has been invaded by unknown attackers, the fleet is disabled. Can you repel the intruders alone in your single fighter? Twin stick action melded with old school shooter. Multiple planets and levels of of gameplay.
